body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Melinda Pickrell Jordan on December 14, 1820. Father of Caroline Jordan, Alfred Jordan, Dudley Jordan, and Matilda Jordan. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.
